DOC.brief_summary: To acquire and build a library of image sets to determine if Fuji's TOMO imaging device can replace or compliment current imaging standards to assess patients with hip, wrist or tibia injuries.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Comparing Diagnostic Imaging Versus Tomosynthesis in Detection of Hip, Wrist or Tibia Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects presenting with a wrist injury, tibial fracture, or hip injury that require protocol defined standard imaging will have an X-Ray, CT Scan (or MRI per site preference) and TOMO completed. Images will be assessed to determine if TOMO is appropriate to supplement or replace the need for the other standard images.
DOC.criteria: Physician request to have diagnostic imaging for condition areas Under 18 Pregnancy Insufficient Anatomical Coverage or Potential Image Problems
